title: kW to HP Converter – Convert Kilowatts to Horsepower

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Mechanical horsepower 1 HPmech = 745.699872 W 1 kW = 1000 W HPmech = kW × 1000 / 745.699872 ≈ kW × 1.34102 kW = HPmech × 745.699872 / 1000 ≈ HP × 0.74570

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Metric horsepower (PS) 1 PS = 735.49875 W HPmetric = kW × 1000 / 735.49875 ≈ kW × 1.35962 kW = HPmetric × 735.49875 / 1000 ≈ HP × 0.73550
